original_text: As a person's money becomes more, there are more people who want a share of it. Money does not help the people who have a lot of it. They see it, but it quickly disappears. As a person's money becomes more,
korean_text: 재산이 많아지면 먹는 자들도 많아지나니 그 소유주들은 눈으로 보는 것 외에 무엇이 유익하랴

sentences.original_text: As a person's money becomes more
there are more people who want a share of it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 돈의 일부를 원하는 사람들이 더 많아진다

sentences.original_text: Money does not help the people who have a lot of it
sentences.korean_translation: 돈은 그것을 많이 가진 사람들을 도와주지 못한다

sentences.original_text: As a person's money becomes more
